concept.title: Case 1: Basic prepaid plan for data consumption

section.title: Overview
section.p: Suppose you have an iPhone, which is associated with a prepaid plan that has a monetary bucket for consumption of data services. When you initiate a data call on your iPhone, the monetary bucket is charged for its data services.
In this case, when the monetary bucket is left with only 1 United States dollar, an email is sent to your registered email ID notifying that the monetary bucket is left with 1 United States dollar.

ul.li: Create a device lifecycle with defined states.
Associate the device (which is, iPhone) with a monetary bucket of 10 United States dollars for consumption of data services.

Subscribe to a bundle pack is subscribed and the value is used in the data bundle at a defined rate. For example, either data is charged 0.125 United States dollars per 25 MB of data consumed or data is charged at 1 United States dollar from the monetary bucket per 15 minutes of data consumed.
Initiate a data call from your iPhone and the call is charged from the monetary bucket balance.
Verify that the data call is successful and charging is done correctly from the monetary bucket as per the defined rate.
Verify that an email is sent to your registered emaild ID when the monetary bucket is left with 1 United States dollar.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case.Entities for case 1
Entity Task
Notification preferences Select the notification channel as email.
Notification template Create a notification template and add the text to be sent in an email notification.
Notification server Configure a notification server to send an email notification.
Thresholds Create a money type threshold profile group to send notification when a monetary bucket is left with 1 United States dollar.
Rate Create different rates for volume-based and time-based data consumption.
Charging Service
Create a charging service with the following details:
Bucket: Create a monetary bucket.
Tariff: Create a tariff formula to apply different rates for volume-based or time-based data consumption for the charging service.
Bundle Create a bundle and associate it with a subscription lifecycle.
Lifecycles Create a subscription, account, and device lifecycles.
User Create a user and make it owner of the device.
Account Create an account and associate with an account lifecycle.
Device Create a device and associate with a bundle and device lifecycle.
